title: CJCSC, scientists; employees of NCA, SPD contribute salaries in COVID-19 relief fund: ISPR
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 31 (APP):In the wake of supporting national efforts in fight against COVID-19 or coronavirus,
Chairman Joint Chiefs of Staff Committee (CJCSC) General Nadeem Raza, Scientists, Engineers and employees of National Command Authority (NCA) and Strategic Plans Division (SPD) have contributed their salaries in COVID-19 Relief Fund.
CJCSC General Nadeem Raza had contributed one monthâ€™s pay in COVID-19 Relief Fund, Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR) said.
The amount of salaries donated by the officials included three days salary by the employees of Special Pay Scale 11-14, two days salary by the employees of Special Pay Scale 8-10and one day salary by the employees of Special Pay Scale 1-7.
